text:
@realDonaldTrump @JHoganGidley DEAR INCOMPETENT GASBAG IN CHIEF, 
The one chance you had at reelection was for the Governors to successfully suppress the coronavirus epidemic. But being a fool you have blown that up too. By election day 250,000 Americans will have died from the coronavirus. You're finished.

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
